111.name: Educação, nível não especificado
111.description: The codes in this category are to be used only when level of education is unspecified or unknown (e.g. training of primary school teachers should be coded under 11220).

151.name: Governo e sociedade civil, geral
151.description: N.B. Use code 51010 for general budget support.

152.name: Conflitos, paz e segurança
152.description: N.B. Further notes on ODA eligibility (and exclusions) of conflict, peace and security related activities are given in paragraphs 76-81 of the Directives.

210.name: Transportes e armazenamento
210.description: Note: Manufacturing of transport equipment should be included under code 32172.

230.name: GERAÇÃO E FORNECIMENTO DE ENERGIA
230.description: Energy sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to energy ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified energy activities including energy conservation.

233.name: Geração de energia, fontes não renováveis

410.name: Proteção geral do ambiente
410.description: Covers activities concerned with conservation, protection or amelioration of the physical environment without sector allocation.

510.name: Apoio orçamental geral
510.description: Budget support in the form of sector-wide approaches (SWAps) should be included in the respective sectors.

530.name: Outra ajuda por meio de mercadorias
530.description: Non-food commodity assistance (when benefiting sector not specified).

720.name: Resposta de emergência
720.description: An emergency is a situation which results from man made crises and/or natural disasters.

730.name: Ajuda à reconstrução e reabilitação
730.description: This relates to activities during and in the aftermath of an emergency situation.  Longer-term activities to improve the level of infrastructure or social services should be reported under the relevant economic and social sector codes. See also guideline on distinguishing humanitarian from sector-allocable aid.

740.name: Prevenção e preparação contra catástrofes
740.description: See code 43060 for disaster risk reduction.

998.name: Não atribuído/não especificado
998.description: Contributions to general development of the recipient should be included under programme assistance (51010).
